mapper.select:
SELECT NO, BUSINESSMAN_ID, BUSINESSMAN_NAME, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_PHONE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, OCCUPATION_NAME, WORK_START_TIME, WORK_END_TIME, WORKING_TIME, QUITTING_TIME, SALARY_PLAN, SALARY_PAY, EVALUATION, NOTE FROM RECORD
AND NO = #{no} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND WORK_START_TIME = TO_DATE(#{workStartTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND WORK_END_TIME = TO_DATE(#{workEndTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT NO, BUSINESSMAN_NAME, BRANCH_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, OCCUPATION_NAME, WORK_START_TIME, WORK_END_TIME, WORKING_TIME, QUITTING_TIME, SALARY_PLAN, SALARY_PAY, EVALUATION, NOTE FROM RECORD WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECORD (NO, BUSINESSMAN_ID, BUSINESSMAN_NAME, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_PHONE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, OCCUPATION_NAME, WORK_START_TIME, WORK_END_TIME, WORKING_TIME,SALARY_PLAN) VALUES (RECORD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{businessmanId}, #{businessmanName}, #{branchName}, #{branchPhone}, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{occupationName}, TO_DATE(#{workStartTime, jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{workEndTime, jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE, #{salaryPlan})
